product_name: Smith Lyric Sunglasses - Women's - Gray Gradient - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Delightfully sized for all-day wearability, these nostalgically styled frames sport casual comforts with hidden performance features like grippy nose pads suitable for spontaneous beachside sports.
